description: Pants that match your pace. The Aenergy Light soft shell pants are ideal in summer for mountaineering and climbing or for hiking in the mountains during seasonal transitions. They are made from a particularly lightweight and yet abrasion-proof double fabric. The water-repellent treatment is PFC-free. The pants are breathable, quick-drying and their elasticated properties allow freedom of movement. The waistband is elasticated and the drawstring ensures a perfect fit. The climbing harness-compatible pockets have zippers to make sure nothing gets lost. A drawstring allows you to ideally adjust the leg hems for a more streamlined fit, providing a clearer view of your foot placements when mountaineering and climbing. The Aenergy Light SO Pants: their lightest soft shell pants for mountain sports enthusiasts who like to move that bit faster.
name: Mammut Aenergy Light SO Pants, Reg - Mens
